attributes.action: Get Facebook to remove the page "remembering hillsbrough because 96 was never enough"
attributes.additional_details: There's been a page created called "remembering hilsbororugh because 96 was never enough" lots of us have reported this to Facebook and they've said it's not breaking the rules and have kept this man putting sick things about the tragedy! We want it removed and the people involved to be punished

rejection.details: This petition has been closed at the petitioners request
